Reviews.Title: rafael anteliz
Reviews.Author: Rafael Alberto Anteliz
Reviews.Content: si todo positivo pasare la informacion a los amigos ,familia y todo el que se acerque. de nuevo gracias.muchas gracias

Reviews.Title: satisfaction
Reviews.Author: Koku A Kamassa
Reviews.Content: I like this phone. It satisfy my appetite of using a phone without having to deleting some apps to get new once. An as all Samsung phones you just work,work and I sometimes forget that time passes so quick.

Reviews.Title: Sparkling New!
Reviews.Author: John G. Connelly "John"
Reviews.Content: Great phone for a great price. It's simple to set up and locked right on to my home network. Stoked!Update after three months use: performing great. I'm now living in Khartoum, Sudan and it works fine with the SIM cards here, plus accesses the Internet and office wifi just fine. Really happy with this purchase and would buy again.

Reviews.Title: I like it cuz I learnt really quickly how to use it.
Reviews.Author: flor
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use. The camera is great! .... I just like it cuz I learnt really quickly how to use it.

Reviews.Title: samsung galaxy ace rating
Reviews.Author: Ellen Theologes
Reviews.Content: seems to be a very good, easy to use phone.  I only do text and calls so I am not familiar with any other features.
